definition: to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: The vapor boiler is the main equipment consume energy.
sentences.chinese: 热采注汽锅炉是稠油开采中的主要耗能设备。

sentences.english: Application of least energy consumption principle in structural analysis is dis- cussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了最小耗能原理在结构分析中的应用。

sentences.english: The project was designed to be a net-zero home.
sentences.chinese: 该项目被设计成净零耗能的房屋。

sentences.english: As the largest energy-consuming industries, China's construction industry has great energy-saving space.
sentences.chinese: 建筑业作为我国最大耗能行业，有着巨大的节能空间。

sentences.english: The problems of high consumed energy and unsafety of the existing water heater is mainly solved.
sentences.chinese: 主要解决现有热水器耗能高或不够安全的问题。

sentences.english: While they can provide some of the best images, Plasmas are the biggest energy hogs of modern flatscreen HDTVs.
sentences.chinese: 尽管等离子画质很好，却是最耗能的平板高清电视。

sentences.english: The water-releasing regulations of water-controlled bag were studied by pot method in greenhouse.
sentences.chinese: 该文采用温室盆栽法，研究了无耗能控水袋释水规律。

sentences.english: Most design is in such a way it is a total energy waste on airconditioning.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的设计都忽视了节约空调耗能的因素。

sentences.english: As a user of energy consumption, housing industry accounts for a great proportion of energy utilization.
sentences.chinese: 住宅产业作为耗能大户，在能源使用中占很大的比例。

sentences.english: Large energy consumers in Guangdong province face similar situation.
sentences.chinese: 广东高耗能企业也将面临类似的情况。

sentences.english: Drying is a high energy-consuming industry in refined salt industrial production.
sentences.chinese: 干燥是精制盐工业生产中的高耗能环节。

sentences.english: You save money on lower energy costs every month for the life of the product.
sentences.chinese: 相反，你每月的电费都会减少因为这类产品耗能少。

sentences.english: The ductility and dissipation of this kind of structure is better.
sentences.chinese: 这种结构有一定的延性和较好的耗能能力。

sentences.english: A domestic waste water non energy dissipating supercharging secondary utilizing apparatus is disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 一种家庭废水无耗能增压二次利用装置。

sentences.english: This is an Exergy Home in a suburb ofthe United States.
sentences.chinese: 这是美国郊区的一座无耗能的自维持住宅。

sentences.english: SiC synthesis is a high-energy-costing industry.
sentences.chinese: 碳化硅生产是高耗能行业。
